meanings.definition: The quality of being appropriate or suitable for a particular season.
meanings.sent1: The seasonablenesses of the decorations made the party feel festive.
meanings.sent2: I always try to choose clothes that match the seasonablenesses of the weather.
meanings.sent3: The mismatched snowman and beach ball displayed a lack of seasonablenesses.
meanings.sent4: Her sense of style had the seasonablenesses of a fashion icon.
meanings.sent5: The seasonablenesses of the harvest festival brought joy to the community.

meanings.definition: The state of being in accordance with the usual or proper time for something.
meanings.sent1: His punctuality showed the seasonablenesses of his meetings.
meanings.sent2: The arrival of the package was in perfect seasonablenesses with my birthday.
meanings.sent3: The early bird's seasonablenesses caught the worm before anyone else.
meanings.sent4: The train's seasonablenesses allowed me to reach my destination on time.
meanings.sent5: The seasonablenesses of the sunrise marked the start of a new day.

meanings.definition: The condition of being reasonable or fair in relation to the time or circumstances.
meanings.sent1: The seasonablenesses of the decision made everyone feel satisfied.
meanings.sent2: His compromise showed the seasonablenesses of his leadership.
meanings.sent3: The negotiation reached a point of seasonablenesses for both parties.
meanings.sent4: Her explanation had the seasonablenesses of a well-thought-out plan.
meanings.sent5: The seasonablenesses of the schedule ensured smooth operations for the team.
